array.name: club_detail
array.item: Barcelona FC know simply as Barca. Founded in 1899 by a group of Swiss, English and Catalan footballers led by Joan Gamper
Real Madrid Club founded on 6 March 1902 as the Madrid Football Club, the club has traditionallu worn a white home kit since inception.
Fußball-Club Bayern München e.V., also known as FC Bayern München, FC Bayern Munich, or FC Bayern, is a sport club in Jerman which based in München, Bavaria.
Manchester City Football Club is a profesional football club from England. Founded in 1880 as St. Marks (West COrton).
Manchester United Football Club commonly known as Man United, is a profesional football club based in Old Trafford, Greater Manchester, England that competes inthe premiere legue.
Chelsea Football Club is a profesional football club in London, England that competes in the Premiere League. Founded in 1905, home ground in Stamford Bridge.
Associazione Calcio Milan, commonly known as A.C. Milan or just Milan, is a profesional football club in Italia bases in Milan, Lombardia, that competes in Serie A.
Arsenal Football Club is a profesional football club in England based in Holloway district, London. founded in 1886.
